The Status Dashboard is intended to provide at-a-glance information about Library operations. For more information about resources currently available, read the Library’s COVID-19 FAQ.

Jump to a section below:  Access to Materials | Assistance | Spaces

Current Occupancy:

Access to Materials

Digital Materials

A massive digital collection is now available through Virgo. Search now >


Available

Equipment Loan

No equipment is currently available for loan, but instructors who need 3D printing or A/V equipment for courses can contact teachlearn@virginia.edu and we’ll make every effort to assist.


Modified

Instructional Scanning

Request items online or contact your subject liaison for assistance.


Available

Interlibrary Loan

Interlibrary Loan is functional, but the number of institutions able to participate is limited.


Modified

Physical Materials

Request items in Virgo, receive an email when they're ready, and pick them up at a library location. Appointments are no longer required.

Stacks browsing is not available in spring 2021. Items must be requested using the Virgo method above.


Modified

Research Scanning

Research scanning is now underway. Consult a subject liaison if you need assistance.


Available

Special Collections

Staff can assist with research and remote materials access; submit an online Reference Request.


Modified
Assistance

Ask a Librarian

No question is too large or too small, and web chat is available most days a week!


Available

Instructional Assistance

Request general classroom assistance or course-related Special Collections sessions. For help selecting easy-to-access course materials, contact your Subject Liaison.


Available

Research Consultation

Subject liaisons specialize in materials relevant to certain areas of study and can connect you to Library experts of all kinds.


Available
Spaces

Special Collections Reading Room

Available by appointment only. Learn more and make an appointment to visit.


Modified

Stacks Browsing

All Library stacks are closed to the public, and will remain so through spring 2021.


Not Available

Study Spaces

Brown and Clemons Library locations are open to UVA faculty, staff, and students.

All other spaces are closed.


Modified

Book Drops

Most book drops remain operational for returning physical materials. See a map of current book drops and locations.


Modified
